bug.author: LutzWeischerFujitsu
bug.summary: cp: cannot stat '../kubeflow': No such file or directory
bug.description: I try to build it, but get the above error message. In the sub-directory 'bootstrap' I execute 'sudo sh ./build_image.sh'. environment: x86-64, CentOS 8 current master, also branch v1.0
